Name: Derived from Matrix
ActivityDesc: Event Info: Stop the countdown and escape the illusions. Fasten the bonds of our hearts and arrive at the other side of the end.

Name: Ice Queen Lulu
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40
Opening Hours: 2024/08/21 02:00 - 2024/09/19 06:59 (UTC)
Exchange Time: 2024/08/21 02:00 - 2024/09/22 06:59 (UTC)
Event Info:
1. Open a restaurant here with your Constructs. Experience a restaurant like no other. Come and create unforgettable memories with everyone!
2. Assign staff to the Prep Station to prepare Ingredients, to Cooking Station to cook them, and to the Service Area to sell the dishes for Ice Cream Coins. Use Mysterious Timers to make the facilities work faster.
3. Spend Ice Cream Coins to hire more staff and upgrade the restaurant.
4. Spend Ice Cream Coins to unlock more buffs. Apply buffs wisely to maximize your benefits.
5. Complete the Daily Missions and Achievement Missions in Ice Queen Lulu to obtain Lulu Vouchers that can be exchanged for Event Construct R&D Tickets, Trade Vouchers, and other items in the Event Shop.

Name: Guild Expedition IV
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Join a Command Bureau.
Event Info:
1. Join a Command Bureau and clear the stages with other Commandants.
2. Enemies found in the Cliff Fortress of the expedition area! Concentrate your firepower to destroy them!
3. The final boss Moon Eater will revive after being defeated. Can defeat it repeatedly!
4. Beat the final stage and clear Guild Expedition to claim stamps and a lot of tokens.
5. Exchange tokens for various rare materials in Guild Expedition Shop.

Name: Summer Memoir
ActivityDesc: Requirements: Commandant Lv.40\nEvent Info: New story and new Coatings.\nSpend the summer leisurely in the sound of the waves.

Name: Old Lullabies
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40
Event Info:
1. There are a total of 5 difficulty levels, all of which are highly challenging with [Cthylla] being your formidable enemy.
2. All members will be reset once knocked out during the challenge, making the challenge easier to complete.
3. Each stage has its own 3-star clearance conditions. Collectibles will be rewarded once you have earned a total of 3 stars. The more stars you earn, the higher the quality of the collectibles will be.

Name: Babel Tower
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.60

Event Info:
1. Babel Tower is a set of high-difficulty stages.
2. Each stage has its own affixes, which will change the way the stage works.
3. You can select different strategic targets each stage. They will increase the difficulty of combat.
4. You can select affixes for stages. The affixes can aid you in combat.
5. The characters you used to complete the stages will be locked and become unavailable in other stages.
6. You will earn collectible rewards for joining Babel Tower. Your final strategic level will earn you different resource rewards and improve the collectible's quality.

Name: Midsummer Rewind
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52

Event Info:

1. This event requires a total of 3 players to play.
2. There are 5 maps in this event, which will be available one by one over time.
3. In this event, the closer your character is to the camera, the higher score you will reach. Extra points will be granted when all players are of the same faction and enter the picture together.
4. Complete the event missions for different rewards. Let's make unforgettable memories together!

Name: Monochrome Corridor
ActivityDesc:
Event Info:
1. Complete event missions to obtain [Dodecahedron Dice].
2. Spend [Dodecahedron Dice] to unlock puzzle pieces.
3. Put puzzle pieces in the right positions to unlock area rewards.

Name: Lingering Stars
ActivityDesc: Event Info:\nPlay poker guessing to win commemorative coins! Invite your companions to a trip to the Shopping Street.

Name: New Year Lottery (purchase)
ActivityDesc: Instructions: Complete event missions to obtain [New Year Token] (purchase period).

Name: Fortune of Spring
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40.

Event Info:
1. During the event, the event mission [Fortune of Spring] will be available for a limited time.
2. The first clear of each stage will grant a 1st Clear Reward!
3. Let's have fun together, Commandants!

Name: White Wishes
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant lv.40

[Event Info]:
1. During the event, the [White Wishes] event mission will be available for a limited time.
2. Participate in the story with other Gray Ravens for an unexpected journey!

Name: Love Letters
ActivityDesc:
※Exchange gifts to express your true feelings and create beautiful memories on this special day.

Event Info:
1. During the event, you can get special gift item [Radiant Comradery] from event mails or by buying the Purchase Supply Pack.
2. On the [Members - Communication] interface, send special gifts to members to trigger 520 Comms and receive gift mails from the corresponding members.
3. Each character's 520 Comm can only be triggered once.
—For example, send a special gift to [Liv: Lux] after sending one to [Liv: Eclipse] will not trigger a Comm again.
4. Gift mails from the characters contain special item [Voice of Thoughts]. Collect it to unlock and upgrade the corresponding collectibles.

Name: Dumplings and Dragons
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant lv.40

Event Info:
1. During the event, the [Dumplings and Dragons] event mission will be available for a limited time.
2. Participate in the story and search for the fabled Realm of Dragons.
